record.field: [{'model': 'account.account', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'account.move', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.country', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.country.state', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.municipi', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.partner', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.partner.address', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True},{'model': 'res.partner.bank', 'auto_sync': False, 'async_enabled': True}]

OpenERP models to sync with Odoo. auto_sync: sync triggered automatically when create, write or unlink occurs in ERP, otherwise sync only on-demand. async_enabled: if True, sync is done asynchronously
